mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation(reserve_date, bus_id, station_id) VALUES (#{reserveDate}, #{busId}, #{stationId})
mapper.select: SELECT a.reservation_id, a.reserve_date, a.station_id, b.main_place, b.detail_place, b.departure_time, b.office_place, b.office_time, b.bus_id, b.car_num as bus_number, b.phone as bus_driver_number FROM reservation a LEFT JOIN nosun b on a.station_id = b.station_id
SELECT reserve_date, count(reserve_date) as count_reserve FROM reservation WHERE bus_id= #{busId} AND DATE_FORMAT(reserve_date, '%m') = Month(Now()) GROUP BY reserve_date
